### Installing R-Packages


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, sf, ggstatsplot, tmap)
```
:::


### Installing Maptools


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
install.packages("maptools",
                 repos="https://packagemanager.posit.co/cran/2023-10-13")
```
:::


### Importing Geospatial Data


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
acled_sf <- read_csv("data/ACLED_Myanmar.csv")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Rows: 55574 Columns: 31
── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Delimiter: ","
chr (20): event_id_cnty, event_date, disorder_type, event_type, sub_event_ty...
dbl (11): year, time_precision, inter1, inter2, interaction, iso, latitude, ...

ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.
```


:::
:::


### Standardizing Date format


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
acled_sf %>% 
  st_as_sf(coords = c(
    "longitude", "latitude"),
    crs=4326) %>% 
  st_transform(crs = 32647) %>% 
  mutate(event_date = dmy(event_date))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

